definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: During the Jin dynasty, a boy, called Mao Bao, was born into an impoverished family.
sentences.chinese: 晉朝時，有一位名叫毛寶的小男孩，家境十分貧困。

sentences.english: The declining family circumstances of the Compsons is the symbol of the dying away of the old South tradition.
sentences.chinese: 康普生的家境衰敗就是蓄奴制舊南方衰亡的縮影。

sentences.english: Although there are love woman, but the girls home is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他愛着她，而這個女孩的家境非常富裕。

sentences.english: All three are in very poor circumstances.
I am not well-off either. You'd better borrow money from Laoli, who is comfortably off .
sentences.chinese: 我也不富裕，你還是去家境寬展的老李那兒借錢吧。

sentences.english: The result is not good, the family circumstances are poor, receives the human to bully frequently.
sentences.chinese: 成績不好，家境貧寒，經常受人欺負。

sentences.english: He lived a kind of superior living conditions in his early years.
sentences.chinese: 張岱出生於世宦之家，家境殷實，早年生活條件優越。

sentences.english: Now my family condition is getting better and all farm work is done by machines.
sentences.chinese: 現在，家境稍微好些，地裏農活也是機械化了。

sentences.english: In that it will make people have a in another family's feeling of taoyuan.
sentences.chinese: 住在那想必會讓人有一種身處另一個桃園家境的感覺。

sentences.english: Their family financial circumstances are from bad to worse.
The poverty of his family made it impossible for Paul to attend college.
sentences.chinese: 阿寶家境清寒，這使他不能念大學。

sentences.english: You were well offf yesterday, the next day you had nothing.
sentences.chinese: 昨天還家境寬裕，下一天便一無所有。

sentences.english: Her family was quite well-off, and the husband of her eldest sister was the county's governor of the then Republican Government.
sentences.chinese: 家境好，大姐夫又是這個城市裏國民政府的一縣之長。

sentences.english: The woman is registered city alone, a daughter, family circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 女方是城市戶口，獨養女兒，家境好。

sentences.english: I did not have the pleasure of eating at McDonald’s often.
sentences.chinese: 那時我們的家境不好，不能常上麥當勞。

definition: to come down in the world (idiom)/to suffer a reversal of fortune
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
hard pressed for money/in financial straits
to have lost both one's parents
family with a literary reputation (idiom); literary family
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
